attributes.action: Amend Building Regulations to ensure all habitable rooms have floor level above 0.1% annual flood probability level. Lower rooms may be used for garage, utility &c. at owner's risk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is so much building on flood planes that it is impracticable to stop it. 
Other cultures have learned to build on stilts, where necessary, to avoid flood damage. The space between the stilts can still be walled in and used, at purchaser's risk. The environmental agency will provide guidance on the 0.1%/annum flood levels above ordnance datum.
